data.title: Durham Public Schools
data.text:
Dr. Anthony Lewis Sworn In as DPS Superintendent

Welcome and congratulations to Dr. Anthony S. Lewis, who was officially sworn in as Superintendent of Durham Public Schools on Monday, August 12!

DPS Back-to-School Guide 2024-2025

Get ready for the new school year with the DPS Back-to-School Guide! Find all essential information you need to start the year off right. Visit DPSNC.net to access the guide.

All DPS students to receive free meals beginning with 2024-25 school year

Beginning with the 2024-2025 school year, all students attending Durham Public Schools will receive free breakfasts and lunches regardless of the studentsâ€™ family income, where they go to school, or where they live.

DPS Selects New Principal and Magnet Program Director

The Durham Public Schools Board of Education approves Deborah Brown as principal at Merrick-Moore Elementary. Dr. Kengie Bass joins DPS as director of magnet & choice programs.

Southern Spartans Named 'Story of the Year'

The Southern School of Energy and Sustainability boys' varsity soccer team were recognized for their standout season, which took them to the state championships.

Student of the Month | May 2024 | Evan Byers

Congratulations to our May 2024 #WeAreDPS Student of the Month Evan Byers, a senior at Durham School of the Arts.
